name: Escape Your Dream
description:
This is a game that focuses on the reality of Anxiety. If you are sensitive to such a topic and those that are related, I would not recommend you play this game.

You will play as a store clerk called "Anx Depail" who suffers with an extreme case of anxiety. So extreme, that he has locked himself away in a small apartment working a dead end job, surrounded by zero family and friends. You will explore his mind to try and find hints to why he could feel this way. Only you can help Anx Depail and determine his fate. 

These are the amazing people that helped playtest the game:

  • Filip Krawczyk - https://twitter.com/Ali3nH1
  • Rob Pimlott - https://twitter.com/stolesomelemons
  • Katie Lofts - https://twitter.com/myochii
  • Kacper Cybulka - https://twitter.com/CybulkaKacper

Patch 1 - 05/05/2021

  • Fixed random crashes that occur on older computers.
  • Increased the duration of the cutscenes so the players have a chance to read everything.
